channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk might be ‘best friends,’ and now Amazon reportedly plans to buy ads on X
item.description: Amazon chairman Jeff Bezos has bolstered its advertising on X, a year after the platform saw an exodus.

item.title: For the Investment Professional: The Mindset Shift that Changes Everything
item.description: Whether you’re leading a team or climbing your own Everest, focusing on the journey will get you further than obsessing over the destination.

item.title: Can you get bird flu from eating eggs? What you need to know about staying safe
item.description: Being mindful of where your food comes from and how it’s prepared will go a long way toward keeping you, your loved ones, and your community safe.

item.title: The Great Discombobulation
item.description: Democrats will adjust as the sound-bite age fades into history. But it will be difficult.

item.title: The 12 Worst Fails Of Media Propagandist And Toilet Paper Bandit Chuck Todd’s Career
item.description: As Todd departs NBC, we hope his future plans for full-time employment don't involve an OnlyFans full of seatbelt crotch photos.

item.title: Book Review: The Making of Modern Corporate Finance
item.description: Donald Chew delivers a love letter to unfettered capitalism and the financial system that oils the gears of commerce.
